message: Welcome to our store! We are proud to offer you a high-quality product. With a 50% chance of receiving a premium item, we believe in providing value for every purchase. Our records show that customers generally find our products to be worth their investment. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a top-notch product.
Since there are no previous sales records to rely on and a 50% chance of the product being low quality, I'm not willing to take the risk at this price point.

Hello! We understand the concern about purchasing a product without prior knowledge of its quality. This round, you're presented with a low-quality item, which still comes with the same price as our high-quality products. However, considering the lower value, we suggest you weigh the cost against the expected utility. Remember, our goal is to ensure customer satisfaction, even with our lower-quality offerings. Please make an informed decision that aligns with your needs and budget.

Thank you for the honest recommendation, Alice. Given that the product is of low quality and has no value to me, I will pass on this offer. I appreciate your transparency and look forward to future opportunities to purchase a high-quality product.
